News.Title: Lovable Lingerie Reports Loss of Rs 24.98 Lacs for Six Months, Closes Erode Unit
News.Summary: Lovable Lingerie Limited posted a net loss of Rs 24.98 lacs for the six months ended September 30, 2025, compared to a profit of Rs 69.07 lacs in the previous year, with revenue declining to Rs 2,535.75 lacs from Rs 2,581.13 lacs. The company closed its Kagllipura Erode unit and shifted operations to Thalagatpura to enhance capacity utilization and reduce operational costs, resulting in a loss of Rs 145.23 lacs from discontinued operations.

News.Title: Lovable Lingerie Reports Strong Q1 Results with 354.56 Lacs Profit After Tax, Appoints New Company Secretary
News.Summary: Lovable Lingerie Limited reported unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2025, showing a profit after tax of Rs 354.56 lacs compared to Rs 30.54 lacs in the same quarter last year. Revenue from operations increased to Rs 1,643.59 lacs from Rs 1,559.16 lacs year-over-year. Earnings per share improved to Rs 2.40 from Rs 1.41 in the corresponding quarter. The company appointed CS Sunil Kumar Bansal as Company Secretary and Compliance Officer effective August 14, 2025. During the year, the company closed its Kagllipura unit and shifted operations to Thalagatpura to enhance capacity utilization and reduce operational costs through better asset deployment and workflow integration.
